title: Villa View Apartments
posting_body: Beautifully updated 68 unit apartment complex that is seconds away from the newest beach!  Immaculate landscaping on the outside, and inside the apartments features new hardwood floors, new refrigerator and stove appliances, soft close kitchen cabinets, and bedroom ceiling fans.
Free water and sewer for all tenants, along with a 24 hour customer service emergency line.
Contact us today to schedule and appointment!
